lines.text: Die for me, my pet, that we both may be reborn.
Why can't we have a bit of cheerful Italian music, like everyone else?
That man and his damned symphony, or me!
[Carlotta, jumping into Marius' bed before she possesses Gabrielle's body]
It's as though the music were buried in my soul.
This is not Paris, madam... I don't need any evidence.
